## [Anastasia (Natasa) Anastasiadou]{style="font-weight:500;"}

Hello! My name is Natasa and I'm currently working as a research assistant in [Bioinformatics lab](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/), under the supervision of Dr. Psomopoulos, at the [Institute of Applied Biosciences](https://www.inab.certh.gr/), situated within the [Centre for Research & Technology, Hellas](https://www.certh.gr/root.en.aspx). I received my BSc in Biochemistry and Biotechnology from the University of Thessaly and my M.Sc in Translational Research in Biomedicine from the Democritus University of Thrace.
